1370: Ghoris was born in St. Joris straet in 1370.
Got married to Breghlent at age 18 in 1370.
Had a son with Breghlent, Thezonus, at age 18.
1371: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Erkenradis, at age 19.
1372: Lost son Thezonus when Thezonus was 3 years old.
1374: Had a son with Breghlent, Ghiselijn, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Wendelmodis, at age 23.
1376: Lost his wife Breghlent while she was giving birth to Nimme in 1376.
1389: Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 14 years old.
